com.adobe.aem.init.dogmatix.http.handlers.modules

Class ModuleFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adobe.aem.init.dogmatix.http.handlers.modules.ModuleFactory

  • public class ModuleFactory
extends Object
    A Factory which provides module instances on demand. Maintains an internal pool of module instances for re-use, which saves module construction and destruction time. Loads the modules at server startup.
    Author:
    vnagpal

    • Method Detail

      • getModule

        public static AbstractHttpRequestHandlerModule getModule(ModuleConfig moduleConfig)
                                                  throws Exception
        Throws:
        Exception

      • load

        public static void load(List<ModuleConfig> moduleConfigs)
                 throws InvalidModuleException
        Loads the modules instances. Must be called at server startup before the server starts listening. May be called again if we wish to support config reload without server restart in future.
        Throws:
        InvalidModuleException

      • annotatedLoad

        public static void annotatedLoad(String path)
                          throws InvalidModuleException
        Auto-detects and loads the modules in a specific path. Must be called at server startup before the server starts listening. Convenience method to load all modules in a package path by annotating a class with @Module. Inspired from Spring's Component Scan.
        Parameters:
        path - package path under which to scan the modules for
        Throws:
        InvalidModuleException
